CODE.item: CLEAR : WA_ADRC, WA_T001W, WA_J_1IMOCOMP, WA_VBRP, WA_ADRC_HEAD, WA_LIKP.
SELECT SINGLE * FROM ADRC INTO WA_ADRC WHERE ADDRNUMBER = WA_HD_ADR-ADDR_NO.
SELECT * FROM VBRP INTO WA_VBRP UP TO 1 ROWS
SELECT SINGLE * FROM T001W INTO WA_T001W WHERE WERKS = WA_VBRP-WERKS.
SELECT SINGLE * FROM ADRC INTO WA_ADRC_HEAD
SELECT SINGLE * FROM J_1IMOCOMP INTO WA_J_1IMOCOMP WHERE
* FROM J_1IMOCUST "Commented by SPLABAP during code remediation
FROM KNA1 "Added by SPLABAP during code remediation
SELECT SINGLE * FROM LIKP INTO WA_LIKP

CODE.item: ** WA_TAX2-TAXPER = WA_IT_KOND-KBETR / 10 * -1. Hided By Goivd On
* FROM KONV "Commented by SPLABAP during code remediation
FROM PRCD_ELEMENTS "Added by SPLABAP during code remediation
* WA_TAX1-TAXPER = WA_KONV-KBETR / 10 * -1 . "Commented by SPLABAP during code remediation
WA_TAX1-TAXPER = WA_KONV-KBETR * -1 . "Added by SPLABAP during code remediation
* WA_TAX2-TAXPER = WA_KONV-KBETR / 10 * -1 ."Commented by SPLABAP during code remediation
WA_TAX2-TAXPER = WA_KONV-KBETR * -1 . "Added by SPLABAP during code remediation
* WA_TAX3-TAXPER = WA_KONV-KBETR / 10 * -1 . "Commented by SPLABAP during code remediation
WA_TAX3-TAXPER = WA_KONV-KBETR * -1 . "Added by SPLABAP during code remediation
DELETE IT_TAX WHERE DESC = '' AND TAXPER = '0.00'
* MODIFY IT_TAX FROM WA_TAX6 TRANSPORTING TAXPER.
DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM GT_VBRK COMPARING VBELN."#EC CI_SORTED
* FROM KONV "Commented by SPLABAP during code remediation
FROM PRCD_ELEMENTS "Added by SPLABAP during code remediation
FOR ALL ENTRIES IN GT_VBRK WHERE KNUMV = GT_VBRK-KNUMV
SELECT * FROM LIPS INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE IT_LIPS1
LOOP AT IT_LIPS1 INTO WA_LIPS1 WHERE
CONCATENATE LV_CHARG ', ' LV_CHARG1 ', ' LV_CHARG2 INTO WA_TAB-CHARG.
SELECT * FROM LIPS INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE IT_LIPS
WHERE VBELN = WA_TAB-VBELN AND posnr = WA_TAB-POSNR.
split quan1 at '.' into quant quan2.
SORT gt_vbrk by vbeln. "Added by SPLABAP during code remediation
DELETE ADJACENT DUPLICATES FROM GT_VBRK COMPARING VBELN.
* FROM KONV "Commented by SPLABAP during code remediation
FROM PRCD_ELEMENTS "Added by SPLABAP during code remediation
FOR ALL ENTRIES IN GT_VBRK WHERE KNUMV = GT_VBRK-KNUMV
SELECT * FROM LIPS INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE IT_LIPS1
LOOP AT IS_BIL_INVOICE-IT_KOND INTO WA_IT_KOND WHERE KSCHL = 'PR00' OR KSCHL = 'PI01'.
LOOP AT IT_LIPS1 INTO WA_LIPS1 WHERE
CONCATENATE LV_CHARG ', ' LV_CHARG1 ', ' LV_CHARG2 INTO WA_TAB-CHARG.
SELECT * FROM LIPS INTO CORRESPONDING FIELDS OF TABLE IT_LIPS
WHERE VBELN = WA_TAB-VBELN AND posnr = WA_TAB-POSNR.
split quan1 at '.' into quant quan2.
LOOP AT IS_BIL_INVOICE-IT_KOND INTO WA_IT_KOND WHERE KSCHL = 'PR00' or KSCHL = 'PI01'.
